Package gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class represents a four-element color represented by red, blue, green, and alpha single precision floating point values. Color and alpha components should be in the range [0.0, 1.0].
    Version:
    $revison: $
    Author:
    B. Harris

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Color()
      Constructs a Color object with default a value of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 (black).
      Color​(float red, float blue, float green, float alpha)
      Constructs a Color object with the given attribute values.

        red - red component value
        blue - blue component value
        green - green component value
        alpha - alpha component value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if any of the given component values are outside the range [0.0, 1.0].
